backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features to associated source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variable overrides configuring colors and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app and includes metadata and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that loads persisted state and switches between permission and home screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive Internet Identity provider and hook handling login, stored identity loading, and auth state.
Custom hook that persists React state to localStorage with JSON serialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing since backend queries are unused.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with green/amber theme, dark mode, and large readable typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/screens/HomeScreen.tsx: Main UI for entering and parsing transaction messages, toggling voice, showing today's total and recent transactions, and triggering TTS or UPI payment actions.
frontend/src/screens/PermissionExplanati: Explains unavailable SMS/notification permissions in the web prototype and shows privacy details before allowing the user to proceed.
frontend/src/types/transactions.ts: Defines Transaction and ParsedTransaction TypeScript interfaces used throughout the app.
frontend/src/utils/transactionParsing.ts: Parses text messages to detect credit transactions, extracting amount, sender, timestamp, and source with regex and keyword checks.
frontend/src/utils/tts.ts: Provides browser SpeechSynthesis helpers for speaking messages, testing voice, and stopping ongoing speech.
frontend/src/utils/upi.ts: Builds and opens a UPI payment intent URL and shows a fallback alert with the UPI ID if launching fails.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, breakpoints, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata including app goals, architecture notes, features, and required assets for Voice UPI Alert.
